text: Imagine a vast sheet of paper on which straight Lines, Triangles, Squares, Pentagons, Hexagons, and other figures, instead of remaining fixed in their places, move freely about, on or in the surface, but without the power of rising above or sinking below it, very much like shadows only hard and with luminous edges and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen. Alas, & few years ago, I should have said universe' but now my mind has been opened to higher views of Imagine a Vast Sheet of paper on which straight Lines Triangles Squares Pentagons Hexagons and other figures instead of remaining fixed in their places move freely about on or in the surface but without the power of rising above or sinking below it very much like shadows only hard and luminous edges and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen. Alas, a few years ago, I should have said universe but now my mind has been opened to higher views of things.
handwritten_text: Imagine a vast sheet of paper on which straight Lines, Triangles, Squares, Pentagons, Hexagons, and other figures, instead of remaining fixed in their places, move freely about, on or in the surface, but without the power of rising above or sinking below it, very much like shadows only hard and with luminous edges and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen. Alas, a few years ago, I should have said universe but now my mind has been opened to higher views of things.
